subject: JPopupMenus in JDK 1.4.2
msgSnippet: Guys, I have a piece of code to look for a JPopupMenu triggered on a table right click event. This works fine with JDK 1.4.1_xx but fails to do so in JDK
messageBody:
Guys, I have a piece of code to look for a JPopupMenu triggered on a table
right click event. This works fine with JDK 1.4.1_xx but fails to do so in
JDK 1.4.2.

JMenuItemFinder menuItemFinder = new JMenuItemFinder("^" + label + "$");
JMenuItem menuItem = (JMenuItem) TestHelper.findComponent(menuItemFinder,
frameWindow, 0);
assertNotNull(menuItem); //This fails in 1.4.2 but works just fine in JDK
1.4.1

Does anyone know why? I read on the sun site that showing a JPopupMenu
causes focus to transfer to the parent JRootPane. Could this be of any
concern? Or should I be looking for the PopupMenu in anyother way?

Thanks in advance,
Karthikeyan.R
